Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: This pub is the oldest pub in Amsterdam. I recommend visiting this place if you are interested in the history of alcohol, moreso on the serving on all types of brands, gin, jenever, etc. If you go, make sure to scrutinize the ceiling and walls, bathrooms

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Kept hearing it was the "oldest pub in Amsterdam" but that must be bs, right? Anyhow, great place - loads of friendly people locals and tourists shoulder to shoulder having a good time like it should be

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: I accidentally walked into this bar on the Christmas Eve. It was filled with people from the neighborhood but everyone was friendly tons foreigner. The beer was good. The unique decoration and the vibe of the bar left me with warm feelings during a not so great period of mine.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Ok, this is my new favorite bar on Earth. Seriously!  Dark and cozy with gazelligheid for days, feels like stepping back in time. Super classy barmaid. Wonderful music. Delicious bitterballen. Tiny but very atmospheric brown bar that feels so local. If I lived nearby, I'd go every single day.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Super quaint bar! Full of locals! The beer is good and so is the jenever! If your a whiskey and vodka drinker this is an interesting taste of both in a shot. The drinks range from 4-6 euros per pint. Unfortunately there's no food, but the …

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text:
Our new favourite local bar!
The host is really nice and the atmosphere is genuine

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Called in here during a short stay in the city. Must be good as we managed to visit Friday and Saturday. Really good traditional brown bar/cafe in a good location. Friday seemed to be a mainly after work crowd but we were certainly welcome. …

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: A wonderfully relaxing place to enjoy a cold beer and appreciate the history of this bar. Can't recommend it enough.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: LOVE this place! Proper Dutch pub, exactly what I was looking for in Amsterdam while the wife visited the Anne Frank House. Drinking ice cold beer and watching the old boys playing billiards. Bliss!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Super friendly and cosy little place, great service and fairly cheap beer

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text:
A very nice and cozy bar. The Owner is very sweet and friendly. There were many locals but we still felt very welcome as tourists and enjoyed a few beers, bitterballen and a nice talk with other guests.
The prices are more than fair!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Super friendly staff, great atmosphere and beautiful old bar!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Beautiful very old and traditional bar, very friendly staff and reasonable prices. Only downside is not accepting cards.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: A must go in Amsterdam. It’s one of the oldest pub in the city, but they don’t rely only on that to make money. Good beer with good prices. You could also order drinks, spirits and glasses of wine. They have few snack options. Don’t miss the meatballs.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: A bar from the 17th century that reminds you why bars ever existed. An Amsterdam must.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Very cozy pub with very nice staff. A lot of locals and regulars sitting at the bar chatting with the bartender. It's a nice place to go if you want to get away from the touristic places and 'drink like a local'. Nice beer selection. …

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Had to go in cafe Chris! This place is proper local and after a quick Google, proper old too! It's dark inside but that gives it a chilled vibe. It can get quite busy but you'll find a spot. We sat in the corner and played chess! 2 beers, 6 euro, cheap as chips for the Dam! Funny little bar with so much character.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great Pub! The barman is super friendly. Totally recommended!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text:
Good for a beer with friends
Relaxed atmosphere and the owners are extremely gentle and nice, but the menu is kept to the minimum, with only few beers and ciders and no food nor stuff like …

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text:
One of the best brown cafe in Amsterdam!
Very cosy and quiet, beautiful small terrace!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Amazing experience. You get a deep feeling of history together with a great social drinking experience. Phillip the barkeep is funny and great at figuring out how much to chat with each patron. If you like to chat, sit at the bar and chat with Phillip and the regulars.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Lovely little cafe. Sat outside in the sun enjoying cider. I found the drinks to be quite cheap. The lady behind the bar spoke English, but she wasn't overly friendly. To be fair I'm probably going to remember most places in Amsterdam to be rather pleasant, but I think the condition I was in may also influence that.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Austeblief! The bar is cash-only, but it has a great sense of history and eclectic decor. Not a huge menu, but they are the type of bar that stocks the special glass that goes with each beer/cider. Cold beer, charming vibe, and tasty snacks at a reasonable price.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Cafe Chris in De Jordaan  has been my living room for more than 10 years. I used to live in De Jordaan .There I have spent a lot of enjoyable nights. Extremely positive atmosphere and nice people. I have a lot of friends in Cafe Chris. I called the guy behind the bar - Sir Philip.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Such a great evening in this pub. Cozy decor with lovely historical touches. The bartender was very friendly and served us many rounds of Bols with a smile. Look out for th vintage cash register!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Honestly. When someone makes the time when it is busy to make sure you have a good time, then the bar staff have done a good job. The kindest bar man in Amsterdam. Credit to him and the team. 9.5 out of 10. Oh wait it's out of 5....

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Authentic brown cafe bar. The real deal. Atmospheric. Good beers and friendly welcome and engaging bar tenders. Tucked away off a main road but worth searching out.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Such a lovely autentical bruin bar! My favourite place in Amsterdam. Just slow down and have a drink here.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: 400 year old café, nice and chill

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Excellent. One of the oldest bars in Amsterdam (1624). Not touristy (except me). Gets lovely mid-afternoon sun. Quiet side street. Nice people. Exactly what I was after.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: A very quiet, very cozy pub, but they only accept cash and there isn’t a lot there snack-wise. Overall, if you’re looking a for a quiet place to have a drink, this is a really nice spot.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Cute, small and quiet! They only accept cash. It definitely has charm and the bartender had on classic French jazz type music playing, really added to the charm!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Perfect cafe to get away from the buzz. Great beer, lovely place and lovely ladies at the bar. We really enjoyed our evening!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Beautiful bar, great atmosphere, amazing people and good beer. Thanks to bartender Philip for making me feel like a local! I truly hope I'll visit this place again.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text:
Stopped here by chance because my travel companion was called Chris too, lovely little classical bar with an old feel.
Would stop by again for a few drinks some time.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Lovely & old 'bruin cafe' in the heart of Jordan, definitely worth of a visit!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Really cool place. Friendly waiters, locals who say hello if you enter. Good beer, good prices and it's kind of ancient. They've been tapping beer since 1624. Just go there.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: I have been here many times and once about the third time I went I left my mans bag with my electronics phone ,go pro ,passport ,about 700 euro's when i was thoroughly convinced it was gone I stopped back there for a cold beer and a …

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Very cozy environment and classic bar to have a beer. You can taste a wide variety of beers in here and you may enjoy the view of Westerkerk. Only cash, no PIN.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: A really intereating little pub,  very traditional, looks pretty much like i imagine it would have a couple of hundred years ago. A mix of locals and tourists frequent here and its dog friendly too!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Nice little place. Thé neighborhood is soooo cosy. We were just outside the bar on the bench next to the wall. Such a good place to grab a beer aside the agitation of the city !

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: One of the old bars in Amsterdam. Inside you can still feel the atmosphere of the golden ages. When you are in Amsterdam, you should drink a “Biertje” in cafe Chris!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: I absolutely adore this bruin cafe. It's charming, full of locals, and the owner is super friendly. Definitely order an Amstel and some bitterballen and hang out for awhile. You won't regret it.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Stopped in just for an overnight in Amsterdam. Brother-in-law recommended café Chris. Exceptional! Reminds me of a small village pub… Definitely go there!!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great corner pub, good vibe and great service. As tourist was a  great discovery and i'm very pleased that me and my friend decided to have a break and enjoy a good beer.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Awesome local bar. Very small & intimate, full of history. The staff are friendly legends if you're respectful & polite. Great simole menue.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Classic 400 year old brown bar - one of, if not the oldest, in Amsterdam - situated in the wonderful Jordaan district. Well worth a visit.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Relaxed, good prices and a nice mellow music selection to accompany the sounds of billiard balls in the background. Dimly lit and most everything is a wooden surface, my kind of place

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Super gezellig place. Perfect bar to spend an evening. There’s some snacks (meats, cheese) but not a ton, and cash only.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: One of the best places in Amsterdam to meet real amsterdammers, playing pool and drink great beer. Here you get the full Amsterdam/Jordaan experience, in one of the most historic cafe of Amsterdam.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: This is totally a locals bar, with it's own cast of characters, but very welcoming. Stop by for a semi-quiet drink if you get a chance.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: A classic corner pub with comfortable outdoor bench seating. Dark aged wood interior and of course delicious beer.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: An amazing spot with great history and atmosphere! Be prepared to be the only foreigner. If you're not adaptable you'll stick out pretty quickly as this place is strickly locals

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great little cafe with a very nice owner/barman. In addition, the ambience is good even though there is no to little music playing.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Small glasses of bad wine, rude service, no atmosphere, s bit too busy real Amsterdam brown Cafe.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Only bottled beers are available. Be careful with the final price since menus do not include the prices. Could lead a misunderstanding at the end. Overrated.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Very old pub with low ceiling and small space. Visited by locals. Good bitterballen, nice authentic Dutch experience!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Do yourself a favor and visit this little local spot. For good beers, great company (the locals) and a bar that's been here since 1624. Yes. 1624. Enjoy!!!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Proper traditional Dutch bar, good prices, lovely place.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: What a gem! Felt like we walked into a movie set. The bartender was so nice, and loved the group of locals.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great brown bar experience, friendly staff and very reasonable prices for a beer or three

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great laid back bar in the Jordaan area. Quiet area so don't expect a frat party.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Lovely little friendly pub.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Cozy bar with relax vibe, good beer and decent food. Perfect to have a beer with friends and have a good chat.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Super cute place with affordable drinks and snacks. Keep in mind that it's cash only though!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Because the drinks were fairly reasonably priced and it was an interesting place to visit.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Cafe with good beer! Going back there tonight for a quick 🍺🍻

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: One of the oldest workers pubs in Jordaan. Amazing athmosphere.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Nice host, cheap beers, wonderfull place !

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great spot to enjoy a few beers in what's probably the oldest bar in Amsterdam

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Friendly neighbourhood bar. It's always been here but the owners still make every visit special.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Quaint little Spot, old fashioned but worth a drink in an old "brown cafe"

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Small and nice bar. Chouffe from tap. Everything out of wood

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Very old building and very nice atmosphere, good beer, perfect!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Lovely old cafe with welcoming atmosphere and friendly locals.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great cosy bar especially the cheesy beer. 😂

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: What a cracking name for a drinking establishment.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Awesome bar, great service and patrons. Try their croquette balls.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: The oldest pub in Amsterdam. Good beer!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Nice friendly place to have a beer 🍻

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Super small sidewalk patio but the people viewing here is worth the stop.

Review Text: Weird old cafe, good place to chill.

Review Text: Great pub, lovely people, fab host 😚

Review Text: Lovely owner, good beer and nice people

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Nice little pub with a cool athmosphere.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Very pitoresque pub with a very nice retro taste

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Quirky decor, wood panelled walls and stained glass windows.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Try the jenever along with a draft beer. Nice service.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great pub, with lovely staff.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Wonderful bar with tremendous charm.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: The local atmosphere, the view of Westerkerk since 1624 and flushing from outside the toilets!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Very local friendly neighborhood cafe
